item.title: Youtube Video Editor - Jake Tran Type Videos - Upwork
item.description:
As a YouTube Editor you will be responsible for creating and editing videos for my new YouTube channel, developing script and video editing. I would like to hire someone who can make Jake Tran type videos and has experience making youtube videos like that. I need the footage used to describe the story, using famous movies like Jake Tran does for example, using creative movie clips and other pictures and videos researching as fair use you can use up to 6 seconds and I need sound effects.

The ideal candidate should have a passion for video editing, a strong understanding of YouTube and excellent footage researching skills. You should be proficient in Adobe Premiere Pro, CapCut, or other video editing tools, and have experience creating high-quality videos that engage and entertain audiences.

If you are interested in this position, please submit a proposal outlining your experience and how you can help us achieve our goals. Please include links to your past completed projects that showcase your video editing skills. We look forward to hearing from you!

I am trying to make at least 5 videos a month if not more for other youtube channels I want to start.

Budget: $500
Posted On: July 02, 2024 04:10 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Social Media Marketing, Video Editing, YouTube Marketing, Content Writing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Marketing Strategy
Skills: Social Media Marketing, Video Editing, YouTube Marketing, Content Writing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Marketing Strategy
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: TikTok & Instagram Content Manager - Upwork
item.description:
We are currently actively looking for freelance content creators for our social media accounts, specifically Tiktok.

Objective: Create authentic and shareable content for TikTok, Reels, and Shorts regarding our client's win in an awards programme

Expectations for Content Creator Talent:
1. Craft a storyboard or content flow
2. Structure a video from end to end.
a. Photos and videos may be used and maximized at Creator’s discretion. We'll provide you with the necessary materials.
b. Talent is expected to comply with requests regarding editing.
3. Comply within the given timeline for the specified video.
4. Provide 2-3 community hashtags to boost the post.

Specific video elements
1. Video should be 9:16 aspect ratio (vertical);
2. Length - 45 - 60 seconds;
3. Narration included by bot narration;
4. Edit using capcut (preferred only, may use other platforms as long as Theme and Goal is satisfied)
5. Audio used should be in compliance with copyright or taken from an open source, and
6. Please include the awards logo.

Budget: $150
Posted On: July 02, 2024 03:59 UTC
Category: Content Strategy
Skills:Social Media Content Creation, Instagram Story, TikTok, Instagram, Content Strategy, Video Editing & Production, Video Editing
Skills: Social Media Content Creation, Instagram Story, TikTok, Instagram, Content Strategy, Video Editing & Production, Video Editing
Country: Singapore
click to apply

item.title: Create an Engaging 3D Showcase Video for My Software Platform - Upwork
item.description:
I will provide screen recordings of my software on a laptop, mobile phone, or iPad, and need a talented video creator to transform these into a visually appealing 3D showcase video. The video should highlight the software's features and capabilities with smooth transitions and engaging visuals, and should include animated and moving representations of the devices. The final video should be provided in both portrait format for Instagram and landscape format for YouTube. If you have experience creating high-quality 3D showcase videos and can creatively integrate screen recordings into a 3D environment, please contact me with your portfolio and a quote.

Budget: $40
Posted On: July 02, 2024 03:41 UTC
Category: 3D Animation
Skills:Graphic Design, Animation, Video Production, Video Editing, Motion Graphics
Skills: Graphic Design, Animation, Video Production, Video Editing, Motion Graphics
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: YouTube Content Creator (Reaction Videos) - Upwork
item.description:
Job Title: YouTube Content Creator (Reaction Videos)

Location: Remote

Job Description: We are seeking a talented YouTube Content Creator specializing in reaction videos to join our growing team. As a crucial member of our content production team, you will be responsible for creating engaging and entertaining reaction videos targeted at a diverse online audience.

Key Responsibilities:
Create high-quality reaction videos for YouTube, focusing on a variety of trending topics and themes.
Maintain a consistent upload schedule and meet deadlines for video releases.
Engage with viewers through thoughtful commentary and reactions that resonate with our audience.
Collaborate with our content strategists to brainstorm new video ideas and series concepts.
Edit and enhance video content to ensure high production value and viewer engagement.
Stay updated on YouTube trends and algorithm changes to optimize video performance and reach.

Mandatory Criteria:
Preferably a light-colored girl, to connect authentically with our audience.
Demonstrated ability to confidently engage and perform on camera.
Proven track record of meeting deadlines in a fast-paced environment.
Experience in creating and filming reaction videos for YouTube, with a portfolio showcasing previous work.

Preferred Skills and Qualifications:
Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro).
Strong understanding of YouTube analytics and SEO best practices.
Creative mindset with the ability to innovate and experiment with different video formats.
Excellent communication skills and the ability to collaborate effectively within a remote team environment.
Passion for online content creation and staying ahead of digital media trends.

Benefits:
Competitive compensation based on experience and performance.
Flexible remote work environment.
Opportunity to grow and develop within a dynamic and supportive team.
Access to cutting-edge tools and resources for content creation.

How to Apply:
Please submit your reaction videos, and links to your YouTube channel or portfolio showcasing your work. We look forward to reviewing your application and discussing how you can contribute to our creative team!

Hourly Range: $30.00
Posted On: July 02, 2024 03:38 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Production, Video Editing, Videography
Skills: Video Production, Video Editing, Videography
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Intro/Outro for Marketing Videos - Upwork
item.description:
We are starting a series of online videos and we need intro and outro clips. We will need to edit to customize for each video we produce.

Our branding must be included. See attached SVG. We’d like to have the logo animated. We are open to ideas here. Just a simple fade in and fade out will not be enough.

Intro video should include title and perhaps authors. The outro should include a call to action. We can provide static examples that we are using in our slide decks.

Budget: $500
Posted On: July 02, 2024 03:37 UTC
Category: Motion Graphics
Skills:Video Intro & Outro
Skills: Video Intro & Outro
Country: United States

item.title: [Spanish]Recording simple "how to" tutorial videos for youtube in Spanish. - Upwork
item.description:
**Work description**

I am looking for someone to record simple "how to" tutorials in Spanish.

Here are some examples of the type of content we will be producing:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jH-scRA5Prs&;

We ask that you please take a minute to watch a few videos on the example channels to get an understanding of what kind of videos we are looking for

**Workflow**

1) You will be given the topics for each video

2) You will need to create a tutorial that is short and easy to understand for the viewer

Most videos will be 1 - 3 minute How To tutorials about social media apps, websites etc.

**Due date**

First, you make 3 videos and if they are good I will continue to work with you.

Quantity: 4 videos a day

Workdays: five days a week

*Due date will be a must.

**Payment**

$2 per video

If you create 90 videos per month

2$ x 90 = $180 per month

Payment increases will be given based on quality and attitude.

**How to Apply**
Please be sure to copy and paste the following information into your response.

1. The date you purchased your computer and its specifications (Windows or Mac)
2. OS version of Android or IPhone you are using
3. Can you report, contact, and consult with us instantly?
4. Can you reply within 24 hours?
5. Can you actively communicate with other members?
6. Can you help each other?
7. Can you take an active role in the team's success?
8. Why did you decide to apply?
9. Do you have experience creating videos like the ones on the example channel?
- - If yes, please provide a sample with your proposal
- - If no, please create a short sample to include with your proposal.

Use this topic for the sample:

"How to Check Watch History on X(Twitter)"

Thank you for seeing us through to the end!

Applications will close when we reach the limit of one remaining position. Please apply as soon as possible.

Budget: $500
Posted On: July 02, 2024 03:34 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Castilian Spanish, Voice-Over, Video Editing, Virtual Assistance
Skills: Castilian Spanish, Voice-Over, Video Editing, Virtual Assistance
Country: Japan
click to apply
